<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Takes config path to the new header template. Clears the whole RscControlsTable and sets the new header template.

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> config: [[Config]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctSetHeaderTemplate]] _configPath;</code>
